dmca.title: [ABUSE] Notice of infringement re http://www.hollywoodrag.com senton behalf of Nichol
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com
[mailto:abuse-bounces@lists.theplanet.com] On Behalf Of
cindy_connolly@timeinc.com
Posted At: Tuesday, June 06, 2006 5:27 PM
Posted To: Microsoft Office Outlook Embedded Message
Conversation: Notice of infringement re http://www.hollywoodrag.com sent
onbehalf of Nicholas J. Jollymore
Subject: [ABUSE] Notice of infringement re http://www.hollywoodrag.com
senton behalf of Nicholas J. Jollymore



Re: DMCA Copyright Infringement

 

Dear ISP:

I am an attorney for Time Inc., the corporate publisher of PEOPLE
Magazine.  This will put you on notice of a copyright infringement on a
website hosted by ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

PEOPLE Magazine's exclusive owns exclusive North American rights to the
only photographs which have been taken to date of Angelina Jolie and
Brad Pitt and their newborn baby girl, Shiloh Nouvel. One of these
photographs that appears on the cover of HELLO! Magazine (the
"Photograph") has been posted on the web site
http://www.hollywoodrag.com/ (See
http://www.hollywoodrag.com/index.php?/weblog/comments/people_mag_gets_b
aby_shiloh_pics_for _4_million/).

This letter is an official notification under the provisions of Section
512(c) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act to effect removal of this
Copyright infringement.  I hereby demand that you immediately (TODAY)
issue a cancel message, as specified in RFC 1036, for the specified
postings and prevent the infringer, who is identified by its Web
address, from posting the infringing Photograph to your servers in the
future. Please be advised that by law, as a service provider, you must
"expeditiously remove or disable access to" the infringing Photograph
upon receiving this notice. Noncompliance may result in a loss of the
possibility of immunity under the DMCA.

I have a good faith belief that use of the material in the manner
complained of herein is not authorized by of PEOPLE Magazine, HELLO!
Magazine, Getty Images, their respective licensing representatives, or
the law.  The information provided herein is accurate to the best of my
knowledge.  I hereby swear under penalty of perjury that I am authorized
to act on behalf of PEOPLE Magazine for matters pertaining to
notification of infringement of its exclusive rights in its copyrighted
material.

Please email me, or send to me at the address listed below, a prompt
response indicating the actions you have taken to resolve this matter.

 

Very truly yours,

Nicholas J. Jollymore

Deputy General Counsel

Time Inc.

1271 Avenue of the Americas

New York, NY 10020

* (O) 212 522-3083

* (F) 212 467-0844
